---
title: "Presentations"
---

## International conferences

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(gt)
library(glue)
library(lubridate)
talks <- read_csv("talksInt.csv")
talks <- talks |>
  mutate(Date = dmy(Date)) |>
  mutate(titlelink = ifelse(is.na(Link), Title, glue("[{Title}]({Link})"))) 
talks |>
  arrange(desc(Date)) |>
  select(Date, titlelink, Event, Location, Details, Author) |>
  gt() |>
    gt::fmt_markdown(columns = titlelink) |>
    cols_label(titlelink = "Title") |> 
    gt::cols_width(
      Date ~ px(100),
      titlelink ~ px(400),
      Location ~ px(250),
      Details ~ px(100),
      Author ~ px(100)) |>
  cols_align("left")
```
